creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Look for a Travel Companion

Enter a travel plan or the country you want to travel to, and you can receive information and travel advice from local friends. Maybe you can find a foreign friend who wants to travel together!

Break the Language Barrier

Chat with people from all over the world with Hello Pal. Together, we can bring the world closer together.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

ABOUT HELLO PAL
*****************
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people: the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.

Hello Pal is a registered trademark of Hello Pal International Inc in the United States and other countries.



A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)


Break the language barrier: chat with people from all over the world and learn languages with Hello Pal. Together, we can bring the world closer together.

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.

title: Hello Pal World

container.value:
550 Denman Street, Suite 200
Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.

title: Hello Pal World

container.value:
550 Denman Street, Suite 200
Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.

title: Hello Pal World

container.value:
550 Denman Street, Suite 200
Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.

550 Denman Street, Suite 200
Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.


FOLLOW US ON:
*****************
• Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/hellopalchat/
• Twitter: https://twitter.com/hellopalchat
• Google+: https://plus.google.com/116731178310818772286
• Instagram: http://instagram.com/hellopalchat
descriptionShort: Global Chat platform. Share pics and vids, livestream and receive gifts!

Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.

title:

7.5.8.705

container.value:
550 Denman Street, Suite 200
Vancouver, BC V6G 3H1, Canada

creator: Hello Pal International Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Hello Pal provides an international social platform with instant messaging and livestreaming features. Our users come from more than 200 countries and regions from all over the world.

You can chat with people globally whenever you want and watch livestreams.

APP HIGHLIGHTS
*****************
Global Coverage

Our users from over 200 countries and regions around the world regularly post pictures and other media, from the natural scenery of the United States to the historic buildings of Europe, to help you easily understand different cultures.

Instant Friendship

Met an interesting friend from another country? Follow him or her and start a conversation through chat or video calls!

Get Popular

Get popular on our livestream platform and receive gifts from your followers.

Exciting Events

Invite your friends to sign up on Hello Pal and get rewarded when they spend on gifts. The more you invite, the more rewards you will receive. Also get a chance to win a prize yourself, through one of our events, when you a send a gift.

A neat way to meet new folks from around the world and learn a new language at the same time.
• App Review Central (June 29, 2015) Rating: 4.6/5

This app is perfect for people that want to explore and learn foreign languages.
• Intellectuapp (May 18th, 2015) App of the week

A formidable alternative to the existing and well established language apps on the market.
• Givemeapps (May 17th 2015)

Translate messages in these languages:
• Arabic
• English (American)
• Chinese (Mandarin)
• Dutch
• Filipino (Tagalog)
• French
• German
• Hindi
• Italian
• Japanese
• Korean
• Portuguese (Brazil)
• Russian
• Spanish (Spain)
• Thai
• Turkish


ABOUT HELLO PAL
**************** *
Hello Pal's mission is to bring the world closer together by helping eliminate one of the key obstacles to mutual understanding between people• the language barrier. By creating a platform where it is easy to instantly interact with others around the world, and giving them the tools to communicate with each other in a joyful and fun way, we hope to do our part (however small) in fostering understanding and tolerance between all citizens of the world.

For more information, visit www.HelloPal.com.
Hello Pal is a registered trademark or trademark of Hello Pal International Ltd in Hong Kong and other countries.

For questions and suggestions write to support@hellopal.com.
